NetworkX is a Python package for the creation, manipulation, and study
of the structure, dynamics, and functions of complex networks.

dependent_to.description:
Python package for generation of protein sequences and evolutionary
alignments via discrete diffusion models
dependent_to.name: py-evodiff

description:
Biotite is your Swiss army knife for bioinformatics. Whether you want to
identify homologous sequence regions in a protein family or you would
like to find disulfide bonds in a protein structure: Biotite has the
right tool for you. This package bundles popular tasks in computational
molecular biology into a uniform Python library.
name: py-biotite

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system
